forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 80. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Boston, the afternoon unfolds beneath a partly sunny canopy, the warmth of the sun nudging the temperature near a delightful 80 degrees. A gentle southwest breeze dances through the streets, hinting at an invigorating promise of outdoor comfort, although it carries occasional gusts that playfully rustle the leaves above. As twilight approaches, the clouds thicken, and a chance of evening rain casts a soft shadow over the day. While the allure of the sun may wane into soft overcast, the air cools neatly into the mid-fifties, inviting a cozy embrace from a light jacket or a sweater.

As the day carries forward, this is the kind of weather that beckons one to venture outside, perhaps to explore the winding pathways of a nearby park or to linger with a good book at a local café. Those drawn to the waterfront might find solace in the breeze, as the evening stirs gently, offering a chance to reflect and unwind. With the changing skies leading to the possibility of rain, it’s wise to carry an umbrella, ensuring that the vibrant lifestyle of Boston continues unabated, come what may.
